price: Sun yarda da su kasance tãre da mãtã mãsu zama (a cikin gidãje). Kuma aka rufe a kan zukãtansu, sabõda haka, sũ, bã su fahimta.
arabic: رَضُواْ بِأَن يَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
